name: microclient /ArmyRF
description: Microclient 4 all devices, e.g. push-button phones

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for cookie's encryption.

API_ID.description: An optional Telegram app identifier from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: An optional Telegram app hash from my.telegram.org

GUEST_AUTH_KEY.description: An optional Telethon authorization key for guest account session
